SELECT avatar_url, ttype ,to_openid ,sgroup, targetId,t.stype,t.to_openid,t.content,t.create_time,t.msg_id FROM ( select imuser.avatar_url , chat.t_type ttype, chat.`group` as sgroup , chat.to_openid as targetId, 'self' as stype , chat.to_openid, chat.content, chat.create_time, chat.msg_id FROM yan_im_user_chat chat left join yan_im_user imuser on chat.user_openid = imuser.openid WHERE chat.user_openid =#{userId} and chat.`group` ='1'
UNION
select imuser.avatar_url , chat.t_type ttype , chat.`group` as sgroup , chat.user_openid as targetId, 'receive' as stype , chat.to_openid, chat.content, chat.create_time,chat. msg_id FROM yan_im_user_chat chat left join yan_im_user imuser on chat.user_openid = imuser.openid WHERE to_openid =#{userId} and chat.`group` ='1' ) t WHERE t.msg_id > #{minMsgId} ORDER BY t.msg_id, t.create_time
